page.title: 07 EDUCATION
page.content: Kirk Ireton has one primary school. with two small playgrounds. In the infants playground there is a bell which used to be on the roof. There are{three}classrooms,{Infants, {Lower Juniors}and{Upper Juniors.}Next year the Lower Junior classroom will be a library and T.V. room. We will have just{two}classes because there will only be{38}children. There is a kitchen which cooks for {Carsington}school too. At 11 we usually go to{Anthony Gell {School}in Wirksworth. Some go to{Queen {Elizabeth's}in Ashbourne.They do not have a school bus provided. At Anthony Gell and Queen Elizabeth's they have different teachers for different subjects and move to other classrooms for lessons. They learn different languages. Both Schools are much bigger than Kirk Ireton.
